page.title: 16Leisure in Kingswood
page.content: The most popular pastime for Kingswood families seems to be{swimming}at Soundwell pool. The pool was opened in 1961 and it has a learners pool and diving boards. Children sometimes go with their school or club, or with their parents at the weekend. Watching {television}is the major family entertainment for most homes and hiring{video}films and using{home {computers}are very popular. Children like to play in the{parks}in the summer and go roller skating and cycling on the old railway track between Bitton and Longwell Green. About one third of the children in our survey belong to a{uniformed {organisation}like the{scouts,cubs or {brownies.}Going to the{library,discos, {youth club}and playing board games are popular. Parents enjoy going to the { {pub,sports centre and bingo.}
